wikipedia_page.main: Kate Pyne (June 16, 1943 – June 20, 2015) was an English historian working at the Atomic Weapons Establishment (AWE), Aldermaston. Her work there included the writing of technical history on various aspects of the British nuclear weapons programme from its earliest days to the present time. Prior to taking a degree in Modern History at Queen Mary and Westfield College, University of London, she worked for many years in the aircraft industry.

response: * Kate Pyne, Chief Technical Historian at the Atomic Weapons Establishment, Aldermaston, Berks. Died 20 June 2015
